meanings.definition: The state of being dead or lifeless.
meanings.sent1: The graveyard was filled with the eerie deadnesses of the night.
meanings.sent2: The deadnesses of the abandoned house sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent3: The party had a strange deadnesses, as if everyone was a ghost.
meanings.sent4: The deadnesses of the old tree reminded me of forgotten memories.
meanings.sent5: The deadnesses of the winter landscape made it feel like a frozen world.

meanings.sent1: The classroom was filled with a noticeable deadnesses during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent2: The deadnesses of the conversation made it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent3: The cat's laziness reached new levels of deadnesses as it slept through the day.
meanings.sent4: The deadnesses of the party was like a black hole sucking away all energy.
meanings.sent5: The deadnesses of the town square at night was almost palpable.
